text:
Many companies are looking for Ruby devs in the Bay Area.

We've got an employer-developer speed dating event on November 9th at pariSoma that is free for developers: http://rubydevelopers.eventbrite.com/

We're looking for experienced RoR devs.

Employers coming include: Square, Demandbase, Pago, Groupon, IndieGoGo, thredUP, Lookout, Tapjoy, and many more.

All these positions are SF and Silicon Valley based.
